basics.name: Anonymous
basics.label: Educator / Instructional Design Professional
basics.summary: Detail-oriented, enthusiastic educator with over 12 years experience in Higher Education, skilled in designing curriculum for various faculty members with an aim of integrating technology in meaningful ways.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Oversee the design of first-year Composition curriculum, management of Learning Management System Canvas, and supervision of new Composition instructors. Collaborate with a team of Composition faculty to create anthologies and ensure course objectives are met.
highlights: Designed a common College Composition course shell template on Canvas.
Supervised and trained new Composition instructors.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Facilitated a variety of Composition courses, maintained University objectives, and improved student writing skills as a tutor in the University Writing Lab.
highlights: Planned and facilitated First Year Experience recitations.
Designed and presented professional development opportunities.
Improved student writing skills as a tutor in the University Writing Lab.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Taught College Research, Freshmen Composition, and 20th Century British Literature. Collaborated with other instructors on curriculum needs and best practices
highlights: Designed, implemented, and assessed lessons and assignments for composition and literature classes.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Taught English 9, English 10, Creative Writing, Argumentation and Debate, Mythology and Science Fiction. Sponsored the Forensics Speech and Debate Team. Directed a winter drama production.
highlights: Designed, implemented, and assessed lessons focused on a variety of writing assignments.
Sponsored the Forensics Speech and Debate Team.

courses: Recipient of Dean's Citation of Excellence Award
Nominated for Dean's Outstanding Thesis Award

education.area: Teaching with Technology and Distance Learning

publications.name: Numerous Formal Presentations and Publications
publications.summary: Various presentations and publications related to academic success, instructional design, rhetoric, and teacher-student dynamics. Authored several books on higher education ethics, internet and social media and the rhetoric of green.
